dialogue: What a nice and windy day to be a caterpillar!
If only I had my wings, I could fly down and deliver the mail on time.
At this rate, I'll be slower than the pony express.
I'm Caterpillar, and I deliver the mail.
I'm earning my wings, so I'm a little slow at the moment. But you have wings!
Would you help me deliver to all of the villagers?
